channel.title: ?......just read
channel.description:
..............ok ummm im about to make a register page for my server........ so to make accounts you will have to use register page................ .........
i have a question though...................
how do i make it so that they must use register page to make an account........ so that they can't make a new account just by logging in with new user............
well yea thats it................... also plz don't flam me if this is wrong section............... didn't know which section to post in.............. just move this to rite section if you can............

item.title: ?......just read
item.dc:creator: @Haxor_X Haxor X
item.description:
@Haxor_X wrote:

…yea but if i do that…
won’t they be able to make an account just by logging in still?..
cause wat i want to do rite now is make it so new accounts can’t be made by logging in…

Read full topic

item.title: ?......just read
item.dc:creator: @D_E_C_O_Y D E C O Y
item.description:
@D_E_C_O_Y wrote:

try to set up a database, that when they register it stores a file in a certain folder in your computer, for instance, if you have apache. then you would rig the http server to store a file in the folder characters are in, then make it read characters from the folder.
